content.label:
The tutorial and UI is really bad on this game. I swear I played it a half hour and still have no idea what most matches do.

Also why does the board darken after each icon match. It totally messes with your eyes...

Bad game, bad UI, bad tutorial. NO.

The game punishes guessing at throwing lines of tiles and hoping something matches. If you miss, and wouldn‚Äôt match anything on the bounce-back, the line of tiles will not go back to its original position, but go one, or even two, spots backwards. While I understand this might be a desirable game mechanic from the designer‚Äôs point of view, the matching function is very picky AT TIMES. I haven‚Äôt figured out what makes it REALLY picky about the final position. You need to be almost EXACTLY on the match, or it will punish you. Of course, the times I notice are when it really counts. I‚Äôve only played a couple hours, and this mechanic has already cost me a dozen losses. It‚Äôs... frustrating, which is not something a game should strive for.

I had a pretty fun time matching my way through this fun little puzzler. It offered enough incentive to try a level over if you failed and it didn't punish you for failure.

The music was surprisingly jaunty. A very positive melody throughout the levels kept the matching fun since you felt like you were able to match with the music and it was fun seeing the characters popping up on screen in time to the lovely violin!

3 basic classes; healer, archer, and melee is the basis around the game. Matching 3 like tiles gives you a character of that set. Matching 4 gave you a giant version which added a fun little twist to combat. Upgrading the characters was definitely a bonus because failing a level still netted you rewards to upgrade your characters. The only downside is once you obviously max the characters out, the collected gold is useless.

You're able to upgrade your tower and cannon as well to match the difficulty of the enemies you fight against so it was also rewarding collecting coins for that. Enemies were your standard baddies that came in normal and large forms. After defeating them (they continually spawn) you destroy the tower and proceed. At the end of every level there is a giant boss fight which is a nice reprieve from the normal defending your tower against waves of enemies.

As you are progressing through the levels, you'll be given "quests" that insist of doing very specific in-game actions such as "defeating X amount" of enemies or "matching X amount of large allies" and it was fun trying to complete quests since it offered large amounts of coin to upgrade your characters and tower.

After beating the game I am very satisfied. There was enough challenge to keep me going and the cute animations, coupled with the fun music kept me entertained. I'm only disappointed there was no new game plus offer. Instead, the game has you start all over after completing it. All-in-all, a rewarding game with enough length, challenge, and incentive to warrant a look at!

Wasn't sure at first but as I got the hang of it, it became one of my favorite games.
Try it out you will like it.
It's a fun game. Once you get to a certain level though it seems impossible to beat. I have 2 upgrades I can't unlock because it seems I have to be at a certain level and I can't seem to get there
Like so many games on the App Store I don't feel like I'm having fun when I play this. Leveling up is unrewarding and I feel like I am just working for the next level. Deleted. A waste of money.
While the theme is cute, the disparity between the bosses and players is too uneven and the controls aren't the best I've ever seen in a game. There are better games out there.

This game's aesthetics and implementation are great, but the bosses seem to either crash me or die quickly at near-random. This was something that could be overcome by slogging through all the enemies before each boss attempt, effectively farming gold. However, at the end of the game there's a boss-rush, making the randomness compound, along with all units being maxed by that point. 

It feels so sad to delete this game after playing through everything but the very last bit, but this is just too frustrating to try again. Still, the rest of the game was enjoyable.
Don't get this game! Every time I play the game it doesn't even reach the menu! The screen goes blank and glitches back to my home screen!

Really loving this, totally worth the purchase. Took me a bit to warm up to it but now I'm in the zone!

I think my game is glitched, I'm on day 137 and can't complete the 'recover 2 health crystals with the healer in a level' quest. I've done that a million times and it won't unlock....

content.label: I have just got this game and it will not load on the screen on my iPod because it is 5th generation however I still rate this game a 5 star already because of how stunning this game especially the graphics look from just a few pictures of looking at the game.  I would really appreciate it if you guys can give me my money back. I am sure that this game is great but it is not compatible with my devices so...... title.label: Great game ! No iap most fun match 3

content.label: This game is fun and has a little bit of a strategy component.  I love that there's no iaps and I think this is the best match three game I've played:)
A dollar. Definitely worth my dollar, probably even several dollars.

Omg, so much cheat in this game. 
Out of nowhere your tower gets shot with a cannon and you will no longer be able to make troops, doesn't matter how many combinations your get, you just automatically lose.

But the balancing for the last level is broken. I have all upgrades but one and I cant beat the game, though I've tried for over 20 'days'. Frustration had me deleting it.

Otherwise it was a well balanced, fantasy themed match game.
Last quest does not clear. Bulwark.

title.label: Surprisingly good, but needs some fixes

content.label: I really enjoyed this game for quick sessions riding the train or before falling asleep and that kind of thing. So pleasurable, much more so than usual match 3s. The music is different than one would expect too which is nice. The one flaw for me was that I didn't unlock the last item before beating the last boss and and it now seems impossible for me to win. After days of grinding and grinding the final level, I am sad to say I'm probably gonna give this one up before I ever defeat it entirely. :-(
When I first started playing this game, I was REALLY frustrated.  But if you persist you quickly realize how fun this game becomes.
iPod touch 5 won't run it, updated OS, still won't run.

The upgrades help but the game is mainly luck of the draw. No real skill or strategy involved other than mashing your fingers on the screen. The concept is amazing but could be better. Maybe turn base would have been better?

A nice match 3 game but it runs incredibly hot on my iPod Touch 6 after only a few minutes. Not a game that I feel I can play away from a charger. It doesn't feel like it's doing enough to run this badly.

Wouldn't recommend till at least they release an update.

Downloaded this game when it was first release, still can't play it yet. Game still crashes on loading screen. Have tried to contact game developer, but get no response and have seen no game updates.

I have iPhone 4s up to date version, but there should of been an update sooner to fix this.

I can truly say I enjoyed this game more than most games I've played on the iPhone 6. More than similar games like "you must build a boat". Seamless epic gameplay! Thank you for making this game. I've had endless hours on it and planning more!

Please allow more upgrades to the cannons and health for the tower in the upgrades and possibly the characters to.im stuck at a higher level I've got all the upgrades except the last special weapon and I can't win even though I am a pretty good player.why not let us keep upgrading until we can win because some people might not have the skill to finish the game without them

As with other reviewers, I don't get by splash screen before being dumped out if the completely.

Will update my rating once I can actually use the app.
I recommend this game to everyone I know!!! The match 3 mechanic was boring until they added the strategy of the battle and the ability to bolster your characters.

Awesome game, devs! Definitely a challenge and IMO is much more entertaining than other match-3 style games. However there is an annoying bug (iPhone 5) that occurs when pausing/back grounding the app. It seems to crash when I do this, so I am required to start the level from the beginning each time. Other than that, keep up the great work!

This could be a fun game but it freezes at every opportunity -- three times in the tutorial alone, mid-battle, on the upgrade window... I can't even get a feel for it. This is on iPhone 6. Putting it aside and praying for an upgrade to salvage my $1.99.

I am not generally a fan of match 3 games but this is one exception. I am really enjoying the game with the RPG elements and real time. There is something here for everyone whether a hardcore gamer or pick up and play for a few mins. Great work devs and I hope to see future updates!  Also for all of those complaining that it doesn't work on their devices and thus giving the game a bad review...seriously?!  The specs are clearly indicated under the details section so maybe check that out before buying next time. Some people have put hard work and effort into this and should not be penalized because of ignorance. Smh...

Until you read the fine print that has now been posted by the developer.  That is, this game will NOT run on a LOT of devices and because of Apple's strict refund policy you will have difficulty getting your money back!!
This game looks really awesome and interesting to play, but when I enter the game, it keeps crashing. Please fix this so I can try it out! I really hope this was worth my money...

title.label: The game just kick you out

content.label: This game looks really fun to play, but when the game starts it just kicking you out the screen for no reason.
I have spent 2 dollars just for a game that opens and right before it loads... crashes. Please fix this.

Downloaded the game. Excited to play, except it doesn't work or load past start-up screen. Waste of money. Careless listing on iTunes to mislead consumers into purchase and then hide an edited supported device list that doesn't match in gaming info section. Developers should be embarrassed.
This game is a total waste of money so just do not get it

I could see this being a free game but for 1.99 its a huge waste. Sat down and played it for 10 minutes and immedietly regretted my purchase. DO NOT BUY. The reviews look good but im serious, you will waste two bucks

This game is so much fun would love to see future updates with more content and upgrades not enough levels aswell should atleast be made endless good time killer makes you think on the fly and think into the future at same time love it def worth 5 stars and future updates or even a sequel well done on this anomaly studios please feel free to reply for any advice

It's a fun tile matching game and it'll keep you busy for a couple of days, but that's about it. There are only 25 levels, and each one will only take a few minutes to beat. After you beat the final level the game automatically wipes your save data and starts you off at the beginning with an unskippable tutorial. If the game had a New Game + feature or a Survival Mode it would easily be 5 stars, but without it the game is just too short to be worth the investment.
I really liked this game, it's a quick 4-5 hour game but worth it to kill some time.

I'm sure the game itself isn't bad. It would help if I could even play the game. Start screen loads, hopes get high, screen goes black, back to the home screen. Fix. This. PLEASE. If you cant do this or something, give me my money back. This can easily turn into a 5 star review. Just fix this one thing or re release the game and make it free.

A fun little matching game. Much better mechanics than other matching games in the genre.
